Title: Vessels of the Spirit
Description:
The Spiritclaws are a sect of mogu assassin-priests who, at the height of the mogu empire, were the most elite and most feared of the emperor's troops.

All have mastered a deathblow which ensnares the spirit of the enemy, trapping it in a jade bottle for delivery to a Spiritbinder.

If you encounter any Spiritclaws further ahead in the ruins, take note: their belts hang with a cursed weight.

Relieve them of their burden and bring the bottles back to me.
ObjectivesText: Recover 8 Spirit Bottles from Shan'ze Spiritclaws in the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
CompletionText:
To think the mogu have continued training the Spiritclaws for all these years...

Did you get the bottles?
RewardText:
Thank you, $c.

I can already sense the spirits within these bottles - they cry out with fear, confusion... rage.
